long_description: A handy essential you can stow inside a vehicle, the REI Camper First-Aid Kit provides medical supplies for groups and families. Kit's zippered nylon case has clear foldout compartments that help you find things fast; contains more than 40 items, including the following supplies:. A first-aid/CPR guide. An assortment of adhesive bandages, wound pads and gauze pads; a roll of stretch gauze. Antibacterial towelettes, antibiotic ointment, sting-relief wipes, hydrocortisone cream and muscle gel. A cold pack, triangular bandage, elastic bandages and an assortment of medical tape. Antacid, ibuprofen, acetaminophen and allergy-relief tablets; kit also has a pill vial. Eye drops, sunscreen, burn spray and insect repellent. Bandage scissors and splinter forceps. Assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts, the REI Camper First-Aid Kit has 2 empty end pockets that let you customize the kit by adding personal items.
short_description: A handy essential you can stow inside a vehicle, the REI Camper First-Aid Kit provides medical supplies for groups and families.
